title: Looking for someone possibly 2 players to join a 5s ranked team
body:
we are a low elo ranked team with the potential to climb through the ranks we had a rough set of qualifying matches but are going strong now looking for mostly a dedicated support and top laner but we are fairly flexible and can play any roll we just want someone to be there when we want to play. 

ChickenTwisty is me so add me in game and you can sus it out

replies.body:
Silver 3, Keen to play ranked 5's
IGN: Tealey
add me: F34RxTK, i main adc but i can go top
